author: DistroTube
description:
We've all encountered this annoying problem.  You want to launch a new terminal window and execute a shell command in that new terminal, but the new terminal closes immediately after executing the command.  How can we solve this problem?  Well...let's create a simple script!

THE SCRIPT:
► https://gitlab.com/dwt1/dotfiles/-/blob/master/.local/bin/stay?ref_type=heads
